EmailTemplate.name: Halifax House Price Index Access Request – Denied
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Halifax House Price Index – Access Request Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your recent request to be granted trial access to the Halifax House Price Index administered by Markit.
IHS Markit regret to inform you that the free trial period for Halifax House Price Index has now ended and your request has been forwarded to an account manager who will contact you shortly.
Be advised that the headline UK All Houses All Buyers Index (including 13 months of historical data) will continue to be made available on: www.halifax.co.uk/house-price-index.
If you have received this email in error or have any other questions, please contact us at: support@markit.com.
Kind regards,
IHS Markit Support
U.S.: + 1 877 762 7548 EMEA: + 800 6275 4800 Asia Pacific: + 65 6922 4210 Email: support@markit.com {!Case.Thread_Id}
